data.title: Atlanta News First
data.meta_description: Atlanta News First | 3,051 followers on LinkedIn. Breaking News, Weather, Sports & Traffic from Atlanta News First  | Atlanta News First (WANF) is a CBS affiliate in Atlanta, Georgia, the #7 television market in the United States.  The station delivers over 32 hours of weekly news, weather, sports and traffic as well as hit CBS Programs such as: Survivor, The Amazing Race, NCIS, Bull and 60 Minutes.  Atlanta News First also provides unique content on digital platforms such as AtlantaNewsFirst.com, Facebook, Twitter & YouTube.
data.text:
Atlanta Dream WNBA has forged a partnership with Gray Television to broadcast its games during the 2024 season. All Dream non-national exclusive games will air locally on Peachtree TV (WPCH) and Peachtree Sports Network, giving more fans across the Southeast the opportunity to experience Dream games from their homes than ever before. ‚ÄúWe are thrilled to partner with Gray Television to get the Atlanta Dream into even more households across our state and the Southeast region,‚Äù said Dream President and Chief Operating Officer Morgan Shaw Parker.

üèÄ After almost 30 years away, the Atlanta Hawks are returning home to Peachtree TV (WPCH) in #Atlanta. "This is a tremendous opportunity to give Hawks fans a new, free way to watch our games this season," Atlanta Hawks & State Farm Arena Executive Vice President/Chief Revenue Officer Andrew Saltzman said. "We are thankful to Peachtree TV and Gray Television for making this a reality and look forward to returning the Hawks to our historic local partner for our Friday games." The Hawks return to broadcast is a homecoming for the franchise, which originally aired on WPCH (previously WTCG/WTBS) from 1972-1994 and WANF (previously WGNX/WGCL) from 1986-1993. ‚ÄúWe are thrilled to bring the Hawks back to broadcast on Peachtree TV this season,‚Äù Atlanta News First Vice President and General Manager Erik Schrader said. ‚ÄúSports on broadcast television make the games available to everyone. Not only do longtime fans get their favorite team for free, but it‚Äôs the best opportunity to grow new fans!‚Äù CLICK HERE to read the full press release - https://lnkd.in/ecUDF2EF
